name: Icon Set Design Process: UI Line
description:
The Streamline team has been designing the largest, most comprehensive icon sets for 12 years. This is the first time, we're sharing our intensive icon set design process.


Take a peak at how we designed the User Interface Line icon set which has 1,000 icons in one massive set.


Topics covered

  1. Sketch
  2. Grid
  3. Digitalization
  4. Scale tests
  5. Customizable stroke
  6. Free and open-source
  7. Categories
  8. Color tests
  9. Style variations
  10. Use case tests
  11. References and conclusion


Try our other free vector icon sets in the cloud or view pricing to access the world's largest vector icon sets.



Some of the world's best designers like Tobias Van Schneider, Khoi Vinh, recommend Streamline. Streamline is unlike all other UI sets in the market. Check us out.
